name: RICOSHOT: Pinball Puzzle Game!
description:
RICOSHOT is a puzzle game based on the cube guy Orb. You have one move - fling him in 1 direction (with careful planning, I hope...) through various puzzle rooms to reach the warp! (And if you're feeling up to it, complete side challenges...)

Made during and for the 2019 72hr GMTK Game Jam, by me. Est. dev time: 30 hours.

ALL feedback is welcome, but keep in mind I was short on time for the jam.
